articles.title: Creator of Tsuta, the world's first Michelin-starred ramen shop, dies at 43 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Yuki Onishi was the founder and head chef at Tsuta ramen, which has three outlets in Singapore.
articles.content:
Yuki Onishi, founder and head chef of the world's first Michelin-starred ramen restaurant Tsuta, has died. He was 43.
